title: Inputscope in toast <input> element
body: Allow us to define InputScope for <input> elements with type='text'. Specifically, I would like to set it to Numbers.

comments.body: My app "Action Toasts" would need a number scope for users to enter numbers for calculator action. So please add this feature

The new app I'm currently developing requires the user to enter a number as their answer. Having an input scope would mean that mobile and tablet users won't have to switch their keyboard to the mobile layout anymore.
